segments.text: Excuse me . Do you study Chinese at this university ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I do . But my characters are very bad .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It takes a long time to learn Chinese writing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I am . I am from Guangzhou . I am here to study international relations .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like it so far . But my English still needs work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to study Mandarin and public relations .
segments.speaker: S2
